title: Fake Crypto Projects: Spot and Report Scams
description:
I invested in the Omnera ICO after seeing several high-profile accounts promoting it. These accounts had previously promoted Zcash before a significant pump, which led me to believe Omnera was a legitimate investment.I purchased Omnera ICO tokens for $2,000.On 24-11-2025, when the token claim went live, I followed the link provided for my allocation, pressed “Claim,” and connected my Jupiter wallet. Immediately after connecting, my wallet was drained, resulting in a total loss of $5,101.ICO: OmneraInvestment: $2,000Date of Incident: 24-11-2025Loss: $5,101Wallet Used: Jupiter wallet (used for both purchase and claim)Action Taken: Followed official claim link provided by Omnera. Tryed to claim the tokens, connected my wallet and got drained.

I invested in the Omnera ICO after seeing several high-profile accounts promoting it. These accounts had previously promoted Zcash before a significant pump, which led me to believe Omnera was a legitimate investment.

I purchased Omnera ICO tokens for $2,000.On 24-11-2025, when the token claim went live, I followed the link provided for my allocation, pressed “Claim,” and connected my Jupiter wallet. Immediately after connecting, my wallet was drained, resulting in a total loss of $5,101.

ICO: Omnera

Investment: $2,000

Date of Incident: 24-11-2025

Loss: $5,101

Wallet Used: Jupiter wallet (used for both purchase and claim)

Action Taken: Followed official claim link provided by Omnera. Tryed to claim the tokens, connected my wallet and got drained.

Amount lost

5101.00 USD

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.

https://omnera.fi/

https://omnera.fi/
